name: Matt Straubel
bio: Matt Straubel is an accomplished American guitarist and a dedicated mechanical engineering student at Temple University. He combines his passion for music with a rigorous academic pursuit in engineering.

name: Gregorio Prazeres
bio: Gregorio Prazeres, a citizen of São Tomé and Príncipe, moved to Portugal at 14 to chase his dreams in football and education. His journey reflects a blend of passion for sports and academic excellence.

name: Kunle Adelakin & Matt Straubel
bio: Kunle Adelakin, a visionary computer scientist from Nigeria, and Matt Straubel, a mechanical engineer and guitarist from Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, share their diverse experiences and insights.

name: Zarena Renie Isaac Francis
bio: Zarena Renie Isaac Francis, hailing from Saint Kitts and Nevis, earned her degree in Psychology at Husson University, Bangor ME. She is passionate about understanding sex and sexual relations and is pursuing a master's in Sex Therapy.

name: Damilola Sotunde
bio: Damilola Sotunde is a talented singer, songwriter, and an Energy Systems Engineering student at Eastern Mediterranean University in Cyprus. Her journey is a testament to balancing creativity with technical expertise.

name: Host - Ayo Oji
bio: Ayo Oji, known as the Nigerian Prince, is the host of the Nigerian Prince Podcast. He brings insightful discussions and diverse perspectives to his audience.

name: Host - Ayo Oji
bio: Ayo Oji, known as the Nigerian Prince, is the host of the Nigerian Prince Podcast. He brings insightful discussions and diverse perspectives to his audience.

name: Arthur Bernado
bio: Arthur Bernado is a Brazilian social media influencer, Mixed Martial Artist, filmmaker, and entrepreneur. He leverages his diverse talents to inspire and engage a wide audience.
